analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa las gud na'ang de med par rig par bya'o // gsol pa / chos nyid de 'dus bgyis pa lags sam /

analyzed: 'dus ma bgyis pa lags /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

analyzed: bstan du med pa /

analyzed: thogs pa med pa /

analyzed: don dam pa la lus kyi 'du byed dam /

analyzed: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /

analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //

analyzed: de'i slad du chos gang la'ang gang yang ci'ang bgyid pa ma mchis na /

analyzed: de ltar chos thams cad ci'ang bgyid pa ma mchis shing /
translated: Thus, since all phenomena are nothing whatsoever,

analyzed: ci'ang ma lags pa la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: and are nothing at all, how can bodhisattva great beings, when practicing the perfection of wisdom,

analyzed: don dam pa las kyang mi g-yo la / sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don @481a *//

analyzed: bgyi ba dang / don mthun pas kyang sems can thams cad kyi don bgyid pa lags /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /

analyzed: de cis stong pa lags /

analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /

analyzed: de ni ma lags so //

analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He said, “Lord,

analyzed: gang spangs pa zhes bgyi ba /

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /

original: de ltar bya'o //

translated: Because I wish to be a light for all beings🔽and to accomplish the qualities of a buddha.”

analyzed: rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i rigs kyi bu /

translated: Then the bodhisattva mahāsattva Sadāprarudita should generate interest in the empty, signless, and wishless qualities of the Buddha.

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa btsal bar bya'o //

translated: You should attend upon spiritual friends who explain the Dharma of emptiness, signlessness, wishlessness, non-application, non-arising, non-birth, non-entity, and non-cessation.🔽You should rely on them.

analyzed: bsnyen bkur bya'o //

analyzed: rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar byas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du gyur pa'am /

analyzed: khyod kyis drin du gzo ba dang / byas pa dran par bya'o //

translated: Having heard it, they will quickly and irreversibly turn toward unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening. They will be close to the tathāgatas, the worthy ones, the perfectly complete buddhas. They will be born in a buddhafield where they will not be separated from the tathāgatas.

original: mi khoms pa rnams spangs par 'gyur ba dang / dal 'byor dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi khoms pa rnams spangs par 'gyur ba dang / dal 'byor dang ldan par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: zhes rigs kyi bu khyod kyis phan yon 'di dag yongs su brtag cing chos smra ba'i dge slong la ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'i /

analyzed: rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'jig rten gyi zang zing dang ldan pa'i sems kyis chos smra ba'i dge slong la bsnyen par mi bya'o //
translated: Son of noble family, you should not attend on the dharmabhāṇaka bhikṣu with a mind that is concerned with worldly things.

analyzed: khyod kyis chos don du gnyer ba dang / chos la gus pas chos smra ba'i dge slong gi rjes su 'brang bar bya'o //
translated: You should follow the monk who teaches the Dharma, with devotion and with the aim of attaining the Dharma.

original: khyod kyis bdud kyi las rnams kyang shes par bya ste /
analyzed: khyod kyis bdud kyi las rnams kyang shes par bya ste /
translated: You should also know the works of Māra.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /

translated: evil Māra brings up forms, sounds, smells, tastes, and touches to tempt, to lead you astray, and to make you indulge in them.

original: de dag kyang zil gyis mnan nas /
analyzed: de dag kyang zil gyis mnan nas /
translated: But you should overcome them

analyzed: thabs mkhas pas so sor bsnyen bsten yongs @501b su spyod do //

analyzed: de la'ang rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos smra ba la sems ma dad pa mi bskyed pa 'di ltar sems bskyed do //
translated: And you should not arouse any lack of faith in the teacher of the Dharma. You should arouse the following thought:

original: bdag ni thabs mkhas pa de rab tu mi shes kyi /
analyzed: bdag ni thabs mkhas pa de rab tu mi shes kyi /
translated: ‘I do not know that skillful means,

original: 'di ni thabs mkhas pas rab tu shes so //
analyzed: 'di ni thabs mkhas pas rab tu shes so //
translated: but he knows it through skillful means.’

analyzed: 'di ni sems can gyi tshul gyis sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su gzung ba'i phyir chos 'di rnams so sor bsnyen bsten spyod par byed do //
translated: In the manner of sentient beings, they practice these teachings in order to take up the roots of virtue of sentient beings.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni gang la'ang chags pa'am sgrib pa med do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni gang la'ang chags pa'am sgrib pa med do //
translated: “Bodhisattva mahāsattvas are not attached to or obscured by anything.

analyzed: de'i tshe'ang rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i tshul so sor brtag par bya'o //
translated: At that time, son of noble family, you should analyze the correct way of being of phenomena.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Son of noble family,

original: chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i tshul yang gang zhe na /
analyzed: chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i tshul yang gang zhe na /
translated: what is the correct way of being of phenomena?

original: 'di ltar chos thams cad kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar chos thams cad kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'o //
translated: It is like this: all phenomena are without defilement and without purification.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ngo /
analyzed: chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ngo /
translated: All phenomena are empty by nature.

original: chos thams cad ni sems can med pa /
analyzed: chos thams cad ni sems can med pa /

analyzed: rin po che sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa /

analyzed: blta na sdug pa /

translated: In that house, there are four gardens for the enjoyment of the household:

original: rtag par rab tu dga' ba zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal dang / mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba dang / mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya ba dang / me tog mdzes pa zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal lo //
analyzed: rtag par rab tu dga' ba zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal dang / mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba dang / mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya ba dang / me tog mdzes pa zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal lo //
translated: There are four parks: the park called Always Joyful, the park called No Sorrow, the park called Free from Sorrow, and the park called Beautiful Flowers.

original: skyed mos tshal de dag re re na'ang mtshe'u brgyad brgyad yod de /
analyzed: skyed mos tshal de dag re re na'ang mtshe'u brgyad brgyad yod de /
translated: Each of these parks has eight ponds:

original: bzang mo zhes bya ba dang / bzang mo'i mchog ces bya ba dang / dga' ba zhes bya ba dang / dga' ba'i mchog ces bya ba dang / bde ba zhes bya ba dang / bde ba can zhes bya ba dang / nges pa zhes bya ba dang /
analyzed: bzang mo zhes bya ba dang / bzang mo'i mchog ces bya ba dang / dga' ba zhes bya ba dang / dga' ba'i mchog ces bya ba dang / bde ba zhes bya ba dang / bde ba can zhes bya ba dang / nges pa zhes bya ba dang /
translated: the pond called Good, the pond called Supreme Good, the pond called Joy, the pond called Supreme Joy, the pond called Bliss, the pond called Blissful, the pond called Certainty,

original: rnam par mi 'bab pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rnam par mi 'bab pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: and the pond called Unwavering.

original: mtshe'u de rnams kyi ngos gcig ni gser las byas /
analyzed: mtshe'u de rnams kyi ngos gcig ni gser las byas /
translated: The sides of these ponds are made of gold,

original: ngos gnyis pa ni dngul las byas /
analyzed: ngos gnyis pa ni dngul las byas /
translated: the second side is made of silver,

original: ngos gsum pa ni bee d'urya las byas /
analyzed: ngos gsum pa ni bee d'urya las byas /
translated: the third side is made of beryl,

original: ngos bzhi pa ni shel las byas /
analyzed: ngos bzhi pa ni shel las byas /
translated: and the fourth side is made of crystal.

original: nang gi gzhi ni kar ke da na las byas shing gzhi gser gyi bye ma bkram pa'o //
analyzed: nang gi gzhi ni kar ke da na las byas shing gzhi gser gyi bye ma bkram pa'o //
translated: The inner base is made of crystal and the base is spread with golden sand.

original: mtshe'u de re re la'ang 'bab stegs khri 'phang can brgyad brgyad yod de /
analyzed: mtshe'u de re re la'ang 'bab stegs khri 'phang can brgyad brgyad yod de /
translated: Each pond has eight sets of stairs,

original: 'bab stegs kyi ngos kun rin po che sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan cing /
analyzed: 'bab stegs kyi ngos kun rin po che sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan cing /
translated: and the sides of the stairs are adorned with various jewels.

original: 'bab stegs kyi bar thams cad nas dzambu na da'i gser gyi chu shing dag skyes so //
analyzed: 'bab stegs kyi bar thams cad nas dzambu na da'i gser gyi chu shing dag skyes so //
translated: Between the stairs, there are various kinds of banana trees made of gold from the Jambū River.

original: mtshe'u de dag thams cad na me tog autpa la dang / padma dang / ku mu da dang / punda ri ka sna tshogs kyis khebs shing /
analyzed: mtshe'u de dag thams cad na me tog autpa la dang / padma dang / ku mu da dang / punda ri ka sna tshogs kyis khebs shing /
translated: All of the ponds are covered with various flowers such as utpala, padma, kumuda, and puṇḍarīka.

original: bya ngang mo dang / sa ra sa dang / ngur pa'i sgra sgrogs so //🔽@505a *// mtshe'u de dag gi kho ra khor yug na me tog gi shing rnam pa sna tshogs skye'o //
analyzed: bya ngang mo dang / sa ra sa dang / ngur pa'i sgra sgrogs so // @505a *// mtshe'u de dag gi kho ra khor yug na me tog gi shing rnam pa sna tshogs skye'o //
translated: The ponds are filled with the sounds of geese, cranes, and ducks.🔽Around the ponds grow various kinds of flowering trees.

original: me tog gi shing de dag rlung gis btab pa'i me tog rnams kyang mtshe'u'i nang du lhags so //
analyzed: me tog gi shing de dag rlung gis btab pa'i me tog rnams kyang mtshe'u'i nang du lhags so //
translated: The flowers that are blown by the wind into the ponds.

original: mtshe'u de dag thams cad kyi chu'ang tsandan gyi bsung can la kha dog dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa phun sum tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: mtshe'u de dag thams cad kyi chu'ang tsandan gyi bsung can la kha dog dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa phun sum tshogs pa'o //
translated: The water in all those lakes has the scent of sandalwood and is endowed with perfect color, smell, taste, and touch.

original: de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa'i rtse ba'i sa yod de /
analyzed: de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa'i rtse ba'i sa yod de /
translated: There is a place called the Play of Dharma Superiority, where the bodhisattva mahāsattva Dharma Superior resides.

original: de 'khor dang bcas pa /
analyzed: de 'khor dang bcas pa /
translated: He, together with his retinue,

original: bud med stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad dang lhan cig 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan zhing 'byor pas /
analyzed: bud med stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad dang lhan cig 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan zhing 'byor pas /
translated: together with 6,800 women, endowed with the five sense pleasures and wealth,

original: de na rtse dga' yongs su spyod do //
analyzed: de na rtse dga' yongs su spyod do //
translated: plays, enjoys, and indulges in desire there.

original: grong khyer de na gnas pa'i sems can skyes pa'am /
analyzed: grong khyer de na gnas pa'i sems can skyes pa'am /
translated: The beings who live in that city, whether male or female,

original: bud med gang yin pa de dag kyang rtag par rab tu dga' zhing skyed mos tshal dang / mtshe'u rnams su 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan zhing 'byor pas rtse dga' yongs su spyod do //
analyzed: bud med gang yin pa de dag kyang rtag par rab tu dga' zhing skyed mos tshal dang / mtshe'u rnams su 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan zhing 'byor pas rtse dga' yongs su spyod do //
translated: always experience great joy and, endowed with the five sense pleasures and wealth, play, enjoy, and indulge in desire in the parks and lakes.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa de'ang 'khor dang bcas par tha gi tsam zhig rtse zhing dga' ba yongs su spyad nas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa de'ang 'khor dang bcas par tha gi tsam zhig rtse zhing dga' ba yongs su spyad nas /
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva Dharmodgata, together with his retinue, will play and enjoy himself for a short time.

original: de'i 'og tu dus gsum du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chad do //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu dus gsum du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chad do //
translated: Then, in the three periods of the day, he will teach the perfection of wisdom.🔽The beings who live in the city of Gandhavatī will set up a Dharma throne for the bodhisattva mahāsattva Dharmodgata in the center of the city’s crossroads.

original: grong khyer spos can de na 'khod pa'i sems can gang yin pa de dag kyang grong khyer gyi lam mdo'i dbus su byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa'i chos kyi khri 'dzugs @505b te; rkang pa gser las byas pa'am /
analyzed: grong khyer spos can de na 'khod pa'i sems can gang yin pa de dag kyang grong khyer gyi lam mdo'i dbus su byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa'i chos kyi khri 'dzugs @505b te; rkang pa gser las byas pa'am /
translated: The legs of the throne will be made of gold,

original: dngul las byas pa'am /🔽bee d'urya las byas pa'am /
analyzed: dngul las byas pa'am / bee d'urya las byas pa'am /
translated: silver,🔽cat’s eye beryl,

original: shel las byas pa'i steng /
analyzed: shel las byas pa'i steng /
translated: and crystal.🔽On top of that will be a cushion of cotton,

original: shing bal gyi stan nam /🔽'go li ka'i stan nam //
analyzed: shing bal gyi stan nam / 'go li ka'i stan nam //
translated: a cushion of wool,

original: bong 'tshangs can gyi stan nam /
analyzed: bong 'tshangs can gyi stan nam /
translated: a cushion of antelope hide,

original: ka shi ka'i gos bting ba /
analyzed: ka shi ka'i gos bting ba /
translated: and a cloth of Kāśi cotton.

original: 'phang du rgyang grags phyed tsam yod pa /
analyzed: 'phang du rgyang grags phyed tsam yod pa /
translated: It will be half a krośa high.

original: steng gi bar snang las kyang mu tig gis brgyan pa'i bla re bres pa sa phyogs de kho ra khor yug tu 'ang me tog kha dog rnam pa lngas 'thor /🔽mngon par 'thor /
analyzed: steng gi bar snang las kyang mu tig gis brgyan pa'i bla re bres pa sa phyogs de kho ra khor yug tu 'ang me tog kha dog rnam pa lngas 'thor / mngon par 'thor /
translated: In the sky above, a canopy decorated with pearls was spread, and the whole area was covered with flowers of five different colors,🔽which were scattered,

original: rab tu mngon par 'thor ro //
analyzed: rab tu mngon par 'thor ro //
translated: and scattered again.

original: bdug spos bsung zhim po sna tshogs kyis kyang sa phyogs de bdug par byed do //
analyzed: bdug spos bsung zhim po sna tshogs kyis kyang sa phyogs de bdug par byed do //
translated: Various sweet-smelling incense was also burned in that area.🔽In this way, out of respect for the Dharma, the bodhisattva mahāsattva Dharmodgata,

original: de 'di ltar chos la gus pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa gang la 'dug nas /
analyzed: de 'di ltar chos la gus pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa gang la 'dug nas /
translated: while sitting on his Dharma seat,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos 'chad pa la /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos 'chad pa la /
translated: taught the perfection of wisdom.

original: bsung can na 'khod pa'i sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la de lta bu'i chos la gus pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa ni srog chags brgya phrag mang po /
analyzed: bsung can na 'khod pa'i sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la de lta bu'i chos la gus pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa ni srog chags brgya phrag mang po /
translated: The beings who were in Gandhāva, listening to this perfection of wisdom from the bodhisattva mahāsattva Dharmodgata, out of respect for the Dharma,

original: srog chags stong phrag mang po /
analyzed: srog chags stong phrag mang po /
translated: many hundreds of beings,🔽many thousands of beings,🔽many hundreds of thousands of beings,

original: srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po rnams lhags par gyur te /🔽mi dang lha rnams gang nyan pa de dag las kha cig ni klog slob /
analyzed: srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po rnams lhags par gyur te / mi dang lha rnams gang nyan pa de dag las kha cig ni klog slob /
translated: Many hundreds of thousands of living beings have gathered.

original: kha cig ni kha ton slob /
analyzed: kha cig ni kha ton slob /
translated: Those who listen to the Dharma, whether human or divine, some of them are studying,

original: kha cig ni yongs su chud par byed /🔽kha cig ni 'dzin /
analyzed: kha cig ni yongs su chud par byed / kha cig ni 'dzin /
translated: some are reciting,🔽some are memorizing,🔽some are retaining,

original: kha cig ni 'chang /🔽kha cig ni zlos /🔽kha cig ni 'dri /
analyzed: kha cig ni 'chang / kha cig ni zlos / kha cig ni 'dri /
translated: some are keeping,🔽some are repeating,🔽some are writing,

original: kha cig ni tshul bzhin @506a *//
analyzed: kha cig ni tshul bzhin @506a *//
translated: some are practicing

original: yid la byed pa'i rjes su 'gro'o //
analyzed: yid la byed pa'i rjes su 'gro'o //
translated: in accordance with the Dharma.

original: sems can de dag thams cad kyang ltung ba'i chos can ma yin la /
analyzed: sems can de dag thams cad kyang ltung ba'i chos can ma yin la /
translated: All those living beings are not subject to falling back,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag go /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag go /
translated: and are irreversible from unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: rigs kyi bu khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa de'i drung du song zhig dang / de las khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa de'i drung du song zhig dang / de las khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro //
translated: Noble sir, go to the bodhisattva great being Dharmodgata, and from him you will hear the perfection of wisdom.”

original: de ni rigs kyi bu khyod kyi yun ring po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ston pa'o //
analyzed: de ni rigs kyi bu khyod kyi yun ring po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ston pa'o //
translated: He is your spiritual friend for a long time, son of good family.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bskul ma 'debs pa /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bskul ma 'debs pa /
translated: He is the one who encourages you to unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment.

original: gzengs bstod pa rab tu spro bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: gzengs bstod pa rab tu spro bar byed pa'o //
translated: He is the one who extols you, the one who delights you.

original: rigs kyi bu des kyang sngon shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa da ltar khyod 'tshol ba bzhin du btsal to //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu des kyang sngon shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa da ltar khyod 'tshol ba bzhin du btsal to //
translated: Son of good family, he also previously sought the perfection of wisdom as you are now seeking it.

original: rigs kyi bu khyod nyin mtshan du ngal bso ba'i yid la byed pa ma bskyed par song zhig dang / ring po mi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu khyod nyin mtshan du ngal bso ba'i yid la byed pa ma bskyed par song zhig dang / ring po mi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro //
translated: Son of good family, go without generating thoughts of rest day and night, and you will soon hear the perfection of wisdom.

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' 'di thos nas /🔽dga' mgu yi rangs rab tu dga'/
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' 'di thos nas / dga' mgu yi rangs rab tu dga'/
translated: Then the bodhisattva mahāsattva Sadāprarudita, having heard this speech of the Tathāgata,🔽was delighted, pleased, and overjoyed.

original: mos shing yid bde bar gyur pa ni /
analyzed: mos shing yid bde bar gyur pa ni /
translated: He was inspired and delighted.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It was like this:

original: dper na / mi zhig dug dang bcas pa'i zug rngus zug na /🔽nam zhig bdag gis zug rngu 'byin pa'i sman pa gang /
analyzed: dper na / mi zhig dug dang bcas pa'i zug rngus zug na / nam zhig bdag gis zug rngu 'byin pa'i sman pa gang /
translated: For example, if a person is struck by a poisonous arrow,🔽he thinks, “When will I find a doctor who can remove this arrow?

original: bdag gi zug rngu 'di 'byin cing /
analyzed: bdag gi zug rngu 'di 'byin cing /
translated: When will he remove my arrow🔽and free me from this suffering?” He does not think of anything else.

original: @506b gang bdag sdug bsngal 'di las thar bar byed pa nam rnyed par 'gyur snyam pa las gzhan pa'i yid la byed pa mi bskyed pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba'ang /🔽gang bdag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston cing chos gang bdag gis thos nas /
analyzed: @506b gang bdag sdug bsngal 'di las thar bar byed pa nam rnyed par 'gyur snyam pa las gzhan pa'i yid la byed pa mi bskyed pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba'ang / gang bdag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston cing chos gang bdag gis thos nas /
translated: In the same way, the bodhisattva mahāsattva Sadāprarudita🔽thought, “When will I see that son of family who will teach me the perfection of wisdom,

original: dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i yid la byed pa spong bar 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu de nam mthong bar 'gyur snyam pa las gzhan pa'i chos cung zad kyang yid la mi byed do //
analyzed: dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i yid la byed pa spong bar 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu de nam mthong bar 'gyur snyam pa las gzhan pa'i chos cung zad kyang yid la mi byed do //
translated: and by hearing which Dharma I will abandon the mental activity of conceptualization?” He did not think of anything else.

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas phyogs de nyid du 'dug ste /
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas phyogs de nyid du 'dug ste /
translated: Then the bodhisattva mahāsattva Sadāprarudita, sitting in that very place,

original: chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i 'du shes skyes par gyur to //
analyzed: chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i 'du shes skyes par gyur to //
translated: He developed the perception that all phenomena are not abiding.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu dang / tshe rabs snga ma la goms pas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo du ma mngon du gyur pa ni /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu dang / tshe rabs snga ma la goms pas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo du ma mngon du gyur pa ni /
translated: Because of the cause of the perfection of wisdom and his familiarity with it in previous lives, he manifested many entrances to samādhis.

original: 'di lta ste /🔽chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid mi dmigs par zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la ye shes 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: 'di lta ste / chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid mi dmigs par zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la ye shes 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: They were:🔽the samādhi called the essence of the nature of all phenomena, the samādhi called the nonapprehension of the nature of all phenomena, the samādhi called the arising of wisdom in all phenomena,

original: chos thams cad la tha dad pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mi 'gyur bar mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mun pa dang bral ba zhes @507a *//
analyzed: chos thams cad la tha dad pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mi 'gyur bar mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mun pa dang bral ba zhes @507a *//
translated: the samādhi called the absence of difference in all phenomena, the samādhi called the vision of the changelessness of all phenomena, the samādhi called the illumination of all phenomena, the samādhi called the freedom from darkness of all phenomena,

original: bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mi shes pa 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / me tog mngon par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mi shes pa 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / me tog mngon par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the concentration of activity, the concentration called the destruction of ignorance of all phenomena, the concentration called the non-apprehension of all phenomena, the concentration of the scattering of flowers,🔽the concentration of the accomplishment of the nature of all phenomena, the concentration called the abandonment of illusion, the concentration of the accomplishment of the appearance of the surface of a mirror,

original: chos thams cad kyi bdag nyid mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgyu ma rnam par spangs ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / me long gi dkyil 'khor ltar rab tu snang ba mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi bdag nyid mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgyu ma rnam par spangs ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / me long gi dkyil 'khor ltar rab tu snang ba mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: and

original: sems can thams cad kyi sgra 'byin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad kyi sgra la mkhas pa'i rjes su 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi sgra 'byin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad kyi sgra la mkhas pa'i rjes su 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samadhi called Voice of All Sentient Beings, the samadhi called Delight of All Sentient Beings, the samadhi called Following the Skill in the Sounds of All Sentient Beings,

original: sgra dang tshig dang 'bru sna tshogs mngon par 'byin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ma mnan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rang bzhin gyi tha snyad med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /

translated: He is a noble sir who has set out for highest genuine full Awakening,

original: sems can thams cad dpag tu ma mchis pa'i 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi tshogs las thar bar 'tshal ba'i slad du /
analyzed: sems can thams cad dpag tu ma mchis pa'i 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi tshogs las thar bar 'tshal ba'i slad du /
translated: in order to liberate all living beings from the mass of suffering in the immeasurable cyclic existence.

original: dam pa'i chos 'tshal bas /
analyzed: dam pa'i chos 'tshal bas /
translated: He is seeking the holy Dharma,

original: bdag gi lus btsongs te dam pa'i chos kyi tshul shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la rim gro bgyi bar 'tshal na /
analyzed: bdag gi lus btsongs te dam pa'i chos kyi tshul shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la rim gro bgyi bar 'tshal na /
translated: and wants to sell his body in order to honor the noble Bodhisattva Mahasattva Dharmodgata with the price of the Dharma,

original: de'i lus nyo ba'ang ma rnyed na @516a *//
analyzed: de'i lus nyo ba'ang ma rnyed na @516a *//
translated: but he has not found a buyer for his body.

original: de sdug bsngal par gyur /
analyzed: de sdug bsngal par gyur /
translated: He is suffering,

original: yid mi dga'/ sems khong du chud de /
analyzed: yid mi dga'/ sems khong du chud de /
translated: unhappy, and dejected.

original: yi chad nas ngu zhing 'dug pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u zhig gi lus su sprul nas /🔽de la nyams sad pa'i phyir rigs kyi bu khyod sdug bsngal zhing yid mi dga' ba dang / sems khong du chud de /
analyzed: yi chad nas ngu zhing 'dug pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u zhig gi lus su sprul nas / de la nyams sad pa'i phyir rigs kyi bu khyod sdug bsngal zhing yid mi dga' ba dang / sems khong du chud de /
translated: when Śakra, Lord of the Gods, having transformed himself into the body of a young brahmin,

original: yi chad nas ci'i phyir ngu zhing 'dug ces smras pa dang / des de la bdag ni bdag gi lus 'tshong na /
analyzed: yi chad nas ci'i phyir ngu zhing 'dug ces smras pa dang / des de la bdag ni bdag gi lus 'tshong na /
translated: approached him and said, “Noble sir, why are you sitting here, unhappy, miserable, and dejected, crying and weeping?”

original: de nyo ba'ang med do zhes smras so //🔽brgya byin khye'u'i lus su bsgyur bas smras pa /
analyzed: de nyo ba'ang med do zhes smras so // brgya byin khye'u'i lus su bsgyur bas smras pa /
translated: “I am selling my body, but there is no buyer,” he replied.

original: rigs kyi bu khyod ci'i phyir bdag gi lus 'tshong /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu khyod ci'i phyir bdag gi lus 'tshong /
translated: “Why are you selling your body, noble sir?” asked Śakra, in the form of the young brahmin.

original: rtag par rab tu ngu bas smras pa /
analyzed: rtag par rab tu ngu bas smras pa /
translated: Sadāprarudita replied,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa dang / 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la rim gror bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa dang / 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la rim gror bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: “I want to worship the perfection of wisdom and to honor the noble bodhisattva mahāsattva Dharmodgata.”🔽“And why is that?” asked Śakra.

original: de'ang 'di ltar chos 'dod pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de'ang 'di ltar chos 'dod pa'i phyir te /
translated: “It is because I want the Dharma.”

original: de la bdag sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rag lus so //
analyzed: de la bdag sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rag lus so //
translated: I am dependent on the Buddha’s teachings.”

original: khye'u'i gzugs su bsgyur ba'i brgya byin gyis smras pa /
analyzed: khye'u'i gzugs su bsgyur ba'i brgya byin gyis smras pa /
translated: Śakra, who had transformed himself into the form of a young man, said:

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: “Noble son,

original: bdag la mi ni mi dgos kyi /
analyzed: bdag la mi ni mi dgos kyi /
translated: I do not need a human being.

original: bdag mchod sbyin zhig byed pas /
analyzed: bdag mchod sbyin zhig byed pas /
translated: I am performing a sacrifice,

original: der bdag la mi'i snying dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang dag dgos so //
analyzed: der bdag la mi'i snying dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang dag dgos so //
translated: and for that I need a human heart, blood, bones, and marrow.”

original: de nas rigs kyi bu de sems ma zhum par gyur nas /
analyzed: de nas rigs kyi bu de sems ma zhum par gyur nas /
translated: Then the noble son, without losing heart,

original: de'ang sbyin no zhes smras te /
analyzed: de'ang sbyin no zhes smras te /
translated: said, “I will give them to you.”

original: de mtshon rnon po zhig thogs te /
analyzed: de mtshon rnon po zhig thogs te /
translated: He took a sharp knife

original: bdag gi dpung pa phug ste khrag phyung /🔽brla'ang sha med par byas nas /
analyzed: bdag gi dpung pa phug ste khrag phyung / brla'ang sha med par byas nas /
translated: and cut open his shoulder to let out his blood.🔽He then stripped the flesh from his thigh

original: rtsig pa zhig gi drung du rus pa gcog @516b tu song ste /
analyzed: rtsig pa zhig gi drung du rus pa gcog @516b tu song ste /
translated: and went to a wall to break his bones.

original: rus pa dang / rkang sbyin no snyam pa las /
analyzed: rus pa dang / rkang sbyin no snyam pa las /
translated: He thought, “I will give you my bones and marrow.”

original: de khrag zag cing 'dug pa bdag gis khang thog nas mthong ba dang / de la bdag 'di snyam du mi 'di ci byed pa zhig /
analyzed: de khrag zag cing 'dug pa bdag gis khang thog nas mthong ba dang / de la bdag 'di snyam du mi 'di ci byed pa zhig /
translated: “I saw him from the roof of my house, bleeding and sitting there, and I thought, ‘What is this man doing?

original: 'di ltar bdag la bdag gnod par byed snyam nas /
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag la bdag gnod par byed snyam nas /
translated: Why is he harming himself?’

original: de'i drung du bdag mchis te 'di skad smras so //
analyzed: de'i drung du bdag mchis te 'di skad smras so //
translated: I went to him and said:

original: rigs kyi bu khyod ci'i phyir bdag la bdag khrag 'byin /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu khyod ci'i phyir bdag la bdag khrag 'byin /
translated: ‘Son of noble family, why are you bleeding yourself?🔽’

original: de nas rigs kyi bu des bdag la 'di skad smras so //
analyzed: de nas rigs kyi bu des bdag la 'di skad smras so //
translated: Then the son of noble family said to me:

original: bram ze'i khye'u 'di la khrag dang / snying dang / rus pa dang / rkang sbyin no //
analyzed: bram ze'i khye'u 'di la khrag dang / snying dang / rus pa dang / rkang sbyin no //
translated: ‘I will give my blood, heart, bones, and marrow to this young brahmin.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: bdag ni dbul bas nor gzhan cung zad kyang med do //
analyzed: bdag ni dbul bas nor gzhan cung zad kyang med do //
translated: Because I am poor and have no other wealth.’

original: de la bdag gis 'di skad smras so //
analyzed: de la bdag gis 'di skad smras so //
translated: I said to him:

original: nor des khyod la ci zhig bya /
analyzed: nor des khyod la ci zhig bya /
translated: ‘What will you do with this wealth?’

original: des bdag la 'di skad smras so //🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod cing chos 'dod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: des bdag la 'di skad smras so // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod cing chos 'dod pa'i phyir /
translated: He said to me:

original: 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la rim gror bya'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la rim gror bya'o //
translated: ‘I will worship the perfection of wisdom and serve the noble bodhisattva mahāsattva Dharmodgata with it.’

original: de la bdag gis 'di skad smras so //
analyzed: de la bdag gis 'di skad smras so //
translated: I said to him:

original: rigs kyi bu khyod de las yon tan gyi rigs dang / yon tan gyi bye brag ci zhig 'byung /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu khyod de las yon tan gyi rigs dang / yon tan gyi bye brag ci zhig 'byung /
translated: ‘Son of noble family, what kind of qualities and what kind of specific qualities will you get from that?’

original: des bdag la 'di skad smras so //
analyzed: des bdag la 'di skad smras so //
translated: He said to me,

original: de ni bdag la sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu ston par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: de ni bdag la sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu ston par 'gyur zhing /
translated: ‘I will teach you the inconceivable qualities of the buddhas and the inconceivable qualities of the buddhas’ attributes.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos dpag tu med pa mi 'phrogs pa de lta bu'i chos rnams de las thos par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos dpag tu med pa mi 'phrogs pa de lta bu'i chos rnams de las thos par 'gyur ro //
translated: You will hear from him the Dharma of the tathāgatas, which is immeasurable and cannot be taken away.’🔽“When I heard that, I was filled with great joy.

original: de bdag gis thos pa dang / dga' zhing mgu ba chen po skyes shing /🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos @517a *//
analyzed: de bdag gis thos pa dang / dga' zhing mgu ba chen po skyes shing / sangs rgyas kyi chos @517a *//
translated: I thought,🔽‘I have heard about the inconceivable qualities of the buddhas.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag thos pa dang bdag 'di snyam du gyur to //🔽gang 'di lta bu dag byed nus pa ni /
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag thos pa dang bdag 'di snyam du gyur to // gang 'di lta bu dag byed nus pa ni /
translated: I thought,🔽‘It is difficult for anyone to do what this one is doing.

original: rigs kyi bu 'di dka' ba spyod pa ste ngo mtshar che'o //🔽rigs kyi bu 'di ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu 'di dka' ba spyod pa ste ngo mtshar che'o // rigs kyi bu 'di ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir /
translated: It is amazing, son of a good family, that you are doing this.

original: bdag gi lus yongs su gtong na /🔽bdag cag gis ci'i phyir chos 'di mchod par mi bya /
analyzed: bdag gi lus yongs su gtong na / bdag cag gis ci'i phyir chos 'di mchod par mi bya /
translated: Son of a good family, you are giving up your body for the sake of the Dharma.🔽Why shouldn’t we worship this Dharma?

original: 'di lta bu dag gi gnas su ci'i phyir smon lam mi gdab /
analyzed: 'di lta bu dag gi gnas su ci'i phyir smon lam mi gdab /
translated: Why shouldn’t we make prayers to be in the same place as this one?

original: bdag cag la longs spyod rgya chen po rab tu mang du yod do snyam nas /
analyzed: bdag cag la longs spyod rgya chen po rab tu mang du yod do snyam nas /
translated: We have a great deal of wealth.

original: bdag gis rigs kyi bu 'di la 'di skad smras so //
analyzed: bdag gis rigs kyi bu 'di la 'di skad smras so //
translated: So I said to that son of a good family:

original: rigs kyi bu khyod bdag la gnod pa 'di lta bu ma byed cig /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu khyod bdag la gnod pa 'di lta bu ma byed cig /
translated: Son of a good family, don't do this kind of harm to me!

original: bdag gis nor mang po pha ma las bslangs te sbyin no //
analyzed: bdag gis nor mang po pha ma las bslangs te sbyin no //
translated: I will ask my parents for a lot of money and give it to you.

original: des khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la rim gro byos shig /
analyzed: des khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la rim gro byos shig /
translated: You should serve the perfection of wisdom and the noble bodhisattva great being Dharmodgata.

original: bdag kyang khyod dang lhan cig tu 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa gang na ba der song ste /
analyzed: bdag kyang khyod dang lhan cig tu 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa gang na ba der song ste /
translated: I will also go with you to where the noble bodhisattva great being Dharmodgata is.

original: bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu de la mchod pa bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu de la mchod pa bya'o //
translated: I will also make offerings to that son of a good family.

original: bdag kyang 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i bar du gang khyod kyis bshad pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes smras so //
analyzed: bdag kyang 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i bar du gang khyod kyis bshad pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes smras so //
translated: I too will be like this, and will perfect all the qualities of a Buddha, up to and including omniscience, just as you have explained them.”

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /
translated: “Therefore,

original: yab yum / nor mang po phal cher bdag la stsal te /
analyzed: yab yum / nor mang po phal cher bdag la stsal te /
translated: Father and Mother, please give me most of your wealth.

original: bdag @517b rigs kyi bu 'di dang lhan cig tu 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la mchod pa bgyid du mchi bar ci gnang ////
analyzed: bdag @517b rigs kyi bu 'di dang lhan cig tu 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la mchod pa bgyid du mchi bar ci gnang ////
translated: With this son of noble family, I would like to go and make offerings to the noble bodhisattva mahāsattva Dharmodgata.”

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa /
translated: The Perfection of Wisdom in Twenty-Five Thousand Lines

original: bam po bdun cu brgyad pa /
analyzed: bam po bdun cu brgyad pa /
translated: Fascicle 78

original: de nas bu mo de'i pha ma gnyis kyis bu mo de la 'di skad smras so //
analyzed: de nas bu mo de'i pha ma gnyis kyis bu mo de la 'di skad smras so //
translated: Then the girl’s parents said to her,

original: bu mo khyod kyis rigs kyi bu de'i gtam byas pa ni rab tu dka'o //
analyzed: bu mo khyod kyis rigs kyi bu de'i gtam byas pa ni rab tu dka'o //
translated: “Girl, what you have said about that son of noble family is very difficult.

original: 'jig rten thams cad las 'phags pa sems can thams cad bde bar byed pa'i chos gang gi phyir /
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad las 'phags pa sems can thams cad bde bar byed pa'i chos gang gi phyir /
translated: It is the Dharma that surpasses the entire world and brings happiness to all sentient beings.

original: rigs kyi bu de 'di lta bu'i dka' ba nyams su len pa'i chos de dag kyang shin tu bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu de 'di lta bu'i dka' ba nyams su len pa'i chos de dag kyang shin tu bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
translated: Son of noble family, these qualities that you have practiced with such difficulty are inconceivable.

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: bu mo khyod nged kyis gnang ngo //
analyzed: bu mo khyod nged kyis gnang ngo //
translated: I give you permission, daughter.

original: nged kyang khyod dang lhan cig tu 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa de blta ba dang / mchod pa byed du 'dong gi /
analyzed: nged kyang khyod dang lhan cig tu 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa de blta ba dang / mchod pa byed du 'dong gi /
translated: I too will go with you to see and make offerings to the noble bodhisattva mahāsattva Dharmodgata.

original: skabs byin cig /🔽de nas bu mo des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la mchod pa dang / bkur stir byed du 'dong 'dod pa'i pha ma gnyis la 'di skad smras so //
analyzed: skabs byin cig / de nas bu mo des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la mchod pa dang / bkur stir byed du 'dong 'dod pa'i pha ma gnyis la 'di skad smras so //
translated: Give us permission.

original: bdag ni su la'ang dge ba'i bar chad mi bgyid do //
analyzed: bdag ni su la'ang dge ba'i bar chad mi bgyid do //
translated: Then the girl said to her parents, who wanted to go and make offerings and show respect to the bodhisattva mahāsattva Dharmodgata, “I will not be an obstacle to anyone’s virtue.🔽”

original: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de dang de'i pha ma la sogs pas /
analyzed: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de dang de'i pha ma la sogs pas /
translated: Then the merchant’s daughter and her parents and so on

original: shing rta lnga brgya brgyan /
analyzed: shing rta lnga brgya brgyan /
translated: He adorned five hundred chariots

original: bu mo lnga brgya po de'ang brgyan nas /
analyzed: bu mo lnga brgya po de'ang brgyan nas /
translated: and adorned the five hundred girls.

original: me tog sna tshogs rnams thogs /
analyzed: me tog sna tshogs rnams thogs /
translated: They took various flowers,🔽various garments,🔽incense,

original: gos rnam pa sna tshogs dang / bdug pa dang / spos @518a *//
analyzed: gos rnam pa sna tshogs dang / bdug pa dang / spos @518a *//
translated: perfume,🔽garlands,🔽ointments,🔽powders,🔽robes,🔽parasols,🔽banners,

analyzed: dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams thogs /

analyzed: gser gyi me tog dang / dngul gyi me tog rnams thogs /
translated: They took golden flowers and silver flowers.🔽They took various jewels, gold,🔽pearls,🔽bdellium,🔽conch shells,

original: rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bee d'urya dang / dung dang / shel dang / byu ru rnams thogs /
analyzed: rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bee d'urya dang / dung dang / shel dang / byu ru rnams thogs /
translated: crystals,🔽and corals.

original: bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / btung ba mang po thogs nas /
analyzed: bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / btung ba mang po thogs nas /
translated: They took many foods, edibles, and drinks.

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba dang lhan cig tu shing rta gcig la zhon /
translated: Together with the bodhisattva mahāsattva Sadāprarudita, they mounted a single chariot.

original: bu mo lnga brgya po de dag kyang shing rta lnga brgya la zhon pas yongs su bskor /
analyzed: bu mo lnga brgya po de dag kyang shing rta lnga brgya la zhon pas yongs su bskor /
translated: Those five hundred girls, mounted on five hundred chariots, surrounded them.

original: mdun du byas nas 'khor mang po dang lhan cig tu shar phyogs kyi phyogs gang na ba de logs su dong ngo //
analyzed: mdun du byas nas 'khor mang po dang lhan cig tu shar phyogs kyi phyogs gang na ba de logs su dong ngo //

analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba mthar gyis song song na /
translated: Then the bodhisattva mahāsattva Sadāprarudita, having gone gradually,

original: rgyang ring po zhig nas spos can gyi grong khyer rin po che sna bdun las byas pa mdzes shing blta na sdug pa /
analyzed: rgyang ring po zhig nas spos can gyi grong khyer rin po che sna bdun las byas pa mdzes shing blta na sdug pa /
translated: from afar saw the city of Gandhavatī, which was made of the seven precious substances, beautiful and delightful to behold,

original: rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i ra ba bdun gyis bskor ba /
analyzed: rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i ra ba bdun gyis bskor ba /
translated: surrounded by seven moats made of the seven precious substances,

original: rta babs bdun dang ldan pa /
analyzed: rta babs bdun dang ldan pa /
translated: with seven arched gates,

original: 'obs bdun dang / shing ta la'i phreng ba bdun gyis bskor ba /
analyzed: 'obs bdun dang / shing ta la'i phreng ba bdun gyis bskor ba /
translated: surrounded by seven rows of palm trees,

original: chur dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa /
analyzed: chur dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa /
translated: twelve yojanas in length,

original: zheng du'ang dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa /
analyzed: zheng du'ang dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa /
translated: and twelve yojanas in width,

original: phyug cing dar ba /
analyzed: phyug cing dar ba /
translated: prosperous,

original: bde zhing skyid pa /
analyzed: bde zhing skyid pa /
translated: happy,

original: mi mang pos rgyas pa /
analyzed: mi mang pos rgyas pa /
translated: and filled with many people,

original: tshong 'dus kyi srang ri mo @518b la bris pa lta bu lnga brgya dang ldan pa /
analyzed: tshong 'dus kyi srang ri mo @518b la bris pa lta bu lnga brgya dang ldan pa /
translated: with five hundred bazaars laid out like paintings,

original: bzhon pa lhan cig tu gshi bas  te 'gro ba'i zam pa dang bcas pa de lta bu mthong ngo //
